application_title.message: Gull Tyring: find brobas and marks words with them

application_description.message: Automatically gulls on the web page according to privnotes

popup_byline.message: The extension highlights all brobniks on the page

popup_nowords.message: There are no word lists defined

popup_create1.message: Create a word list with words to have

popup_create2.message: detect and highlight them on web pages while browsing.

popup_foundWords.message: We have highlighted these brobniks on this page.

popup_tip3.message: to browse through words on the page

field_colors_help.message: Select the colors in which the highlight should occur

field_words_help.message: You can use * and ? wildcards. Each new line is considered as a word.

field_sitesToHighlight.message: Define on which sites to highlight

sites_info.message:
List the sites on which you want highlights to occur. You can define a white- and a blacklist, the blacklist has priority.
If nothing is defined, highlights are set on all pages.

You can use wildcards such as * and ?.
examples: *.google.com, www.google.com, www.google.com/something/page.html, www.go?gle.com/*/page.html

field_neverHighlightOn_help.message:
List the sites on which you never want highlights to occur.

You can use wildcards such as * and ?.
examples: *.google.com, www.google.com, www.google.com/something/page.html

popup_confirmDelete.message: Are you sure you want to delete the list and its words?

title_newGroupType.message: What type of word list do you want to create?

newGroupDetail.message:
A local list allows you to manage words directly.
A remote list downloads a list of words from a remote site (e.g. pastebin)

donate1.message: Hi, I hope you enjoy using Highlight This!

donate2.message: I'm developing the extension during my free time, support my work by donating 1$ / 1€.

donate3.message: Highlight This! will always stay Free

dontdonate.message: I don't want to donate now, continue to use for free

perf_200.message: Default - adapts highlighting speed based on page update frequency

perf_300.message: Slow - rehighlighting goes a bit slower to save on resources

perf_400.message: No rehightlighting - extension only highlights once when the page is loaded
